shortDescription: Intelligence sources indicate that lead engineers and top military brass are personally observing trials of a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} prototype super heavy combat units. We need you to take out the observers. If you can also destroy the prototypes there's a bonus in it for you.
longDescription: The prime targets won't be much of a threat. Getting to them is another matter. Plan for a full field that includes superheavy threats.

contractObjectiveList.title: Destroy the Target and Escape
contractObjectiveList.description: Destroy the target, clear area of additional enemy forces, and reach the evac zone with all surviving 'Mechs.

objectiveList.title: Destroy Assassination Lance Hidden Objective
objectiveList.description: Hidden Objective for AutoComplete, Destroy Assassination Lance

objectiveList.title: Armor Breached
objectiveList.description: Armor of the Target is breached.

dialogueContent.words: Sumire says they're a lot of activity ahead {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName}'s intel seems correct.
The target must be up ahead...behind the superheavies.
If you don't want to take them all out head for the evac once the primary is down.
Well done, Commander. A bunch of us were about to turn blue up here, we're breathing again.
This is a disaster. Commander, I'm pulling the plug on this operation.
Target eliminated. Mop up the remaining enemies, or head for the evac LZ.
Readings indicate the support units are out of commission. Our employer will be pleased.
That is our target, sustain fire on that unit!
As I suspected, we have support units coming in to reinforce the enemy.
Commander, the target is bugging out! Eliminate it before they escape.
